snippet: Pop stars like Rihanna and Lady Gaga might be joining a marijuana-culture tradition that formerly embraced men like Jerry Garcia and Willie Nelson, but these women are integrating it into their endorsement deals.
abstract: Several young female pop stars like Rihanna and Lady Gaga are visibly glorifying marijuana use in what is seen as shrewd public relations move, as they integrate it into endorsement deals.
lead_paragraph: Pop stars like Rihanna and Lady Gaga might be joining a marijuana-culture tradition that formerly embraced men like Jerry Garcia and Willie Nelson, but these women are integrating it into their endorsement deals.

headline.seo: For Young Female Pop Stars, Marijuana Use Ties Into Endorsements
headline.main: A Big Business in Getting High
headline.print_headline: A Big Business in Getting High
